ABOUT.para1-part1: This app fetches live JSON metadata from
ABOUT.para1-part2: a HTTP REST API with information about countries world-wide. It also displays data on the world oceans from a JSON data file.
ABOUT.para2: Countries are listed in alphabetical order. The user can search for a country or list countries by world region.
ABOUT.para3: Each country or ocean includes a link to further information. Clicking on a list item shows more detailed information with a map link and an add to favourites button.
